addons.name: Trapper Gloves
addons.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +30 %.

addons.name: Padded Jaws
addons.description:
These Padded Jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.
Bear Traps immobilise Survivors without damaging them.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for trapping Survivors.

addons.name: Makeshift Wrap
addons.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
The Trapper can no longer be caught in his own Bear Traps, they will instead be disarmed when he steps onto them.

addons.name: Bear Oil
addons.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.
Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

addons.name: Wax Brick
addons.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +33 %.

addons.name: Serrated Jaws
addons.description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Lengthened Jaws
addons.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.
Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

addons.name: Coffee Grounds
addons.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grinds.
Grants a 5 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after setting a Bear Trap.

addons.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
addons.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Trap's hold.
Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +33 %.

addons.name: Trapper Bag
addons.description:
A cured leather waist bag.Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
Start with 1 additional Bear Trap.
Increases the Bear Trap Carrying capacity by 1 Bear Trap.

addons.name: Tar Bottle
addons.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
Darkens (α255; R36; G36; B36) the Bear Trap.

addons.name: Secondary Coil
addons.description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
Increases the Bear Trap Disarm time by +50 %.

addons.name: Rusted Jaws
addons.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Fastening Tools
addons.description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
Increases the Bear Trap Rescue and Escape times by +25 %.
Increases the Bear Trap Setting speed by +50 %.

addons.name: Trapper Sack
addons.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning throughout the Trial Grounds.
The Trapper is unable to pick up Bear Traps once placed.

addons.name: Tension Spring
addons.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.

addons.name: Oily Coil
addons.description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
When resetting a Bear Trap, the Aura of the Survivor who had disarmed it is reveal for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Honing Stone
addons.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the Honing Stone sharpens its blades.The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.
Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.

addons.name: Iridescent Stone
addons.description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming Iridescent Stone seem to gain a life of their own.
Every 30 seconds, a randomly chosen disarmed Bear Trap is automatically reset and armed.

addons.name: Bloody Coil
addons.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more dangerous.
When a healthy Survivor disarms a Bear Trap, the Bloody Coil exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.

addons.name: "The Serpent" - Soot
addons.description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by any means, or performing the Damage Generator action on incomplete Generators, will cause The Wraith to automatically uncloak.

addons.name: "The Hound" - Soot
addons.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Pools of Blood appear bright red to The Wraith while cloaked.

addons.name: "The Ghost" - Soot
addons.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the Spirit World, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Continues to suppress the Terror Radius and the Red Stain of The Wraith for 6 seconds after uncloaking.

addons.name: "The Beast" - Soot
addons.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
The Terror Radius of The Wraith is no longer suppressed while cloaked.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.

addons.name: Bone Clapper
addons.description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
Survivors are unable to discern distance and direction of the Wailing Bell's tolls.

addons.name: "Blink" - Mud
addons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by -40 %.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - Mud
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +5 %.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -8 %.

addons.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
addons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - White
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +7 %.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - White
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -10 %.

addons.name: "Shadow Dance" - White
addons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +40 % while cloaked.

addons.name: "Blink" - White
addons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Cloaking time by -60 %.

addons.name: "Blind Warrior" - White
addons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Mangled and Haemorrhage Status Effects until fully healed.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - Blood
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases Cloaked Movement Speed by +9 %.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Reduces Uncloaking time by -12 %.

addons.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
addons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +60 % while cloaked.

addons.name: "All Seeing" - Blood
addons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

When cloaked, the Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 metres of your location.

addons.name: Coxcombed Clapper
addons.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
Silences the Wailing Bell tolls.

addons.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
addons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in The Wraith's Aura-reading ability:

When cloaked, the intensity of the Aura of Generators reveal their Repair progression.

addons.name: Steel Toe Boots
addons.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -12 %.

addons.name: Junkyard Air Filter
addons.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.It still manages to work better than the stock model.
Increases the Overheat limit of the Chainsaw by +20 Charges.

addons.name: Heavy Clutch
addons.description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.
Reduces the Collision Zone width of the Chainsaw by -30 %.

addons.name: Speed Limiter
addons.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with either Bubba's Chainsaw or the Chainsaw do not automatically trigger the Dying State.

addons.name: Dad's Boots
addons.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

addons.name: Punctured Muffler
addons.description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.
Increases the Cooling speed of the Chainsaw by +50 %.

addons.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
addons.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
Reduces the range within which Chainsaw noises can be heard by -30 %.

addons.name: Death Engravings
addons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +15 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

addons.name: Big Buckle
addons.description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol' country boys.
Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while overheated.

addons.name: Mother's Helpers
addons.description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson's purse.Side effects include nervousness and irritability.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -18 % for 30 seconds after being stunned by a Pallet.
"Doctor, please, more of these!" — Evelyn Thompson

addons.name: Low Kickback Chains
addons.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -28 % .

addons.name: Leafy Mash
addons.description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter's scent when stalking prey.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds after hitting a Survivor with the Chainsaw.

addons.name: Doom Engravings
addons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in the Fog.Fills the user with determination.
Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
Reduces the Heat gained from charging the Chainsaw by -14 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

addons.name: Black Grease
addons.description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.
Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +18 % for 30 seconds after being blinded.

addons.name: Tuned Carburettor
addons.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
Reduces the Charge time of the Chainsaw by -25 %.
Reduces the base Movement speed of The Hillbilly to 4.4 m/s.

addons.name: Spiked Boots
addons.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +44 %.
Increases the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by +28 %.

addons.name: Pighouse Gloves
addons.description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances.Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.
Increases your Action speed when damaging Generators and breaking Pallets or Breakable Walls by +20 % while overheated.
Reduces the Pallet Stun duration by -50 %.
"Ain't no mess can stain a hard-workin' man's soul." — Max Thompson Sr.

addons.name: LoPro Chains
addons.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
Allows you to continue the Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall with the Chainsaw.
Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Apex Muffler
addons.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.

addons.name: Iridescent Brick
addons.description:
Once representative of Max Junior's confinement, this was the first brick to fall when his room's barricade came crashing down.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for 2 seconds.
"What kinda ruckus you stirrin', boy?" — Max Thompson Sr.

addons.name: Wooden Horse
addons.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
Reduces the additional Fatigue penalty applied by missed Special Attacks by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: White Nit Comb
addons.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
Reduces the Lunge duration of Special Attacks by -0.15 seconds, reducing the Attack reach of The Nurse's reach by -50 %.

addons.name: Plaid Flannel
addons.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
Unlocks the ability to see the Landing zone of the Blink.

addons.name: Metal Spoon
addons.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
Survivors hit by a Special Attack have the volume of their Grunts of Pain increased by +50 % for the next 60 seconds.

addons.name: Pocket Watch
addons.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Dull Bracelet
addons.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -20 %.

addons.name: Dark Cincture
addons.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.Taken from Father Campbell's body.
Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse during the Chain Blink Window by +30 %.

addons.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
addons.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
Reduces the additional Fatigue penalty applied by Chain Blinks by -65 %.

addons.name: Bad Man Keepsake
addons.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.
Survivors hit with a Special Attack have their Auras revealed to The Nurse if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of her location for the next 60 seconds.

addons.name: Spasmodic Breath
addons.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
Hitting a Survivor with a Special Attack causes the following effects for the next 60 seconds:

Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.6 m/s.
Disables Spencer's Last Breath.

addons.name: Heavy Panting
addons.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from Harvey Kavanagh, the asylum's "Fat Orderly".Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
Extends the Lunge duration of Special Attacks to 130 %, increasing the Attack reach of The Nurse's reach by +30 %.
This effect only applies after the second or third Blink.

addons.name: Fragile Wheeze
addons.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
Survivors hit with a Special Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect.

addons.name: Ataxic Respiration
addons.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the asylum patient known as the "Catatonic Boy".Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -7 %.

addons.name: Anxious Gasp
addons.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl", which The Nurse was fond of.Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
Coming within 1 metre of Survivors while teleporting causes them to scream and reveal their location.
Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

addons.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh, also known as the "Fat Orderly".In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
When succumbing to Fatigue, all Survivors within 8 metres of The Nurse suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Jenner's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl".In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
After exhausting all her Blinks, but before succumbing to Fatigue, press the Active Ability button to cause The Nurse to immediately Blink back to her original position.
Recharges her Power by +1 Charge.

addons.name: Campbell's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum priest Father Campbell.In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
Reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse will automatically Blink at full charge in the direction she is facing.
This requires that The Nurse has at least 1 Charge left after the initial Blink.

addons.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient known as the "Bad Man".In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
Hitting Survivors with a Special Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the next 25 seconds.
"Bad Man's" Last Breath has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

addons.name: Torn Bookmark
addons.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +1.
Extends the Power Recharge duration to 130 %.

addons.name: Matchbox
addons.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
Increases the Movement speed of The Nurse to 4.4 m/s for the entire Trial.
Restricts the Power of The Nurse to 1 Blink.
This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.

addons.name: Tacky Earrings
addons.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +10 %.

addons.name: Memorial Flower
addons.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
Increases the Stalk rate by +11 %.

addons.name: Boyfriend's Memo
addons.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
Increases the range of The Shape's Lunge Attack by +50 % (open time: +0.1 seconds) while in Evil Within I.
"The note is signed: D."

addons.name: Blond Hair
addons.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +10 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

addons.name: Reflective Fragment
addons.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 2 seconds.

addons.name: Jewellery
addons.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.One of Judith's favourites.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +20 %.

addons.name: Hair Brush
addons.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +20 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

addons.name: Glass Fragment
addons.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.It is impossible to determine its origin.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within I, are revealed for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Dead Rabbit
addons.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
Reduces The Shape's Terror Radius by -25 % while in Evil Within II.
Increases The Shape's Terror Radius by +25 % while in Evil Within III.

addons.name: Mirror Shard
addons.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
The Auras of Survivors, who have been stalked for at least 1 second while in Evil Within II, are revealed for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Judith's Journal
addons.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
Increases the Stalk rate on the Obsession by +40 %.

addons.name: Jewellery Box
addons.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
Increases the Movement speed of The Shape while Stalking by +30 %.

addons.name: J. Myers Memorial
addons.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
Increases the Stalk rate by +25 %.

addons.name: Hair Bow
addons.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +30 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +50 % (+2.5 Stalk points).

addons.name: Vanity Mirror
addons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within II.
Each Hit Score Event grants 150 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

addons.name: Tombstone Piece
addons.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Killing a Survivor drains the power of Evil Within III, resetting it to Evil Within II.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +150 % (+7.5 Stalk points).

addons.name: Scratched Mirror
addons.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
Stalking reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location.
The Shape is unable to progress past Evil Within I.
Each Hit Score Event grants 200 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category in addition to the regular Bloodpoints gained in the Brutality Category.

addons.name: Lock of Hair
addons.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
Increases the duration of Evil Within III by +40 seconds.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +100 % (+5 Stalk points).

addons.name: Judith's Tombstone
addons.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
Grants the ability to kill healthy or injured Survivors while in Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).
Reduces the Movement speed of The Shape by -9 % while in Evil Within III.
"Here lies our beloved daughter."

addons.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
addons.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
Grants unlimited duration to Evil Within III.
Increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time by +200 % (+10 Stalk points).

addons.name: Rope Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +15 %.

addons.name: Powdered Eggshell
addons.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +25 %.

addons.name: Dead Fly Mud
addons.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +20 %.

addons.name: Bog Water
addons.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +10 %.

addons.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
addons.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Half Eggshell
addons.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +30 %.

addons.name: Dragonfly Wings
addons.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +25 %.

addons.name: Cypress Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +20 %.

addons.name: Bloodied Water
addons.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +20 %.

addons.name: Willow Wreath
addons.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
The Auras of Survivors tripping a Phantasm Trap are revealed to The Hag for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Setting speed by +25 %.

addons.name: Dried Cicada
addons.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.Devoured to increase stamina.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Teleportation range by +30 %.

addons.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
addons.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Tripped duration by +35 %.

addons.name: Bloodied Mud
addons.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.The bloody layers empower the mud.
Increases the Phantasm Trap's Trigger range by +30 %.

addons.name: Scarred Hand
addons.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
Mud Phantasms have collision with Survivors.
Grants 300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Disables The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.
"..." — The Butcher

addons.name: Rusty Shackles
addons.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

addons.name: Katana Tsuba
addons.description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance duration after a Phase-Walk by +0.2 seconds.
Increases The Spirit's Reappearance Movement speed after a Phase-Walk by +5 %.

addons.name: Uchiwa
addons.description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting when stunned by a Pallet.

addons.name: Mother's Glasses
addons.description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
Survivors coming within 2 metres of the Husk during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.

addons.name: Yakuyoke Amulet
addons.description:
A powerful Talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
Increases the maximum Duration of the Phase-Walk by +3.5 seconds.
Increases the Recovery rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +70 % (0.2333 c/s).
Decreases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by -15 %.

addons.name: Wakizashi Saya
addons.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
During a Phase-Walk, press the Active Ability button to immediately return to the Husk.

addons.name: Furin
addons.description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
Causes all Survivors to hear the Phase-Walk Sound cue.

addons.name: Dried Cherry Blossom
addons.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.Once the symbol of mortality.
Coming within 4 metres of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk will trigger Killer Instinct.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible during a Phase-Walk.

addons.name: Mother-Daughter Ring
addons.description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
Increases the Movement speed during the Phase-Walk by +40 %.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible while using Yamaoka's Haunting.

addons.name: Kintsugi Teacup
addons.description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Pallet or a Breakable Wall.

addons.name: Smiley Face Pin
addons.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Scratched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
Reduces Power Recovery time by -5 seconds.

addons.name: Mischief List
addons.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
Extends Feral Frenzy by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Friendship Bracelet
addons.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
Extends the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by +0.3 seconds.

addons.name: Never-Sleep Pills
addons.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
Reduces the base Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to 4.6 m/s.
Increases the duration of Feral Frenzy by +10 seconds.
Grants a stack-able additional +100 Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of +500 Bloodpoints.

addons.name: Mural Sketch
addons.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
Increases the stack-able Movement Speed boost from successful Feral Slashes to +0.3 m/s, up to a maximum of +1.2 m/s.

addons.name: Julie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
Refills the Power Gauge when getting stunned by any means in Feral Frenzy.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

addons.name: Etched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
addons.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.A signature icon of The Legion.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: The Legion Pin
addons.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Susie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
Extends the Killer Instinct Detection radius by +20 metres.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

addons.name: Stolen Sketch Book
addons.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
From the second Feral Slash onwards, Survivors drop their Items when hit.

addons.name: Stylish Sunglasses
addons.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
Survivors Mending within 24 metres of your location have their Auras revealed to you.

addons.name: Joey's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

addons.name: Stab Wounds Study
addons.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
Survivors who perform a Self-Mend from the Deep Wound Status Effect applied by The Legion have their Aura revealed for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Frank's Mix Tape
addons.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes.A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
Increases the Action speed of damaging Generators by +20 % and breaking Breakable Walls by +30 % during Feral Frenzy.
While performing these interactions, the Power Gauge is paused.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

addons.name: Filthy Blade
addons.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
Increases Mending time by +4 seconds.

addons.name: BFFs
addons.description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.
Hitting Survivors with chained Feral Slashes grants Tokens.The more Feral Slashes are chained together, the higher the amount of awarded Tokens:

First Feral Slash: grants no Tokens
Second Feral Slash: +2 Tokens
Third Feral Slash: +3 Tokens
Fourth Feral Slash: +4 Tokens
Fifth Feral Slash: +5 Tokens
Once the Exit Gates are powered and only if 15 or more Tokens have been acquired, The Legion benefits from the following effect:

Grants a 4 % Haste Status Effect when not using Feral Frenzy.

addons.name: Iridescent Button
addons.description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness.The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Feral Vaults immediately break the vaulted Pallet.
"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."

addons.name: Fuming Mix Tape
addons.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
The Repair Progression of Generators can be determined by the intensity of their Auras during Feral Frenzy.
Generators not being repaired start regressing.
Unlocks an additional music layer in the Terror Radius and Chase Music of The Legion.
Can be combined with other Mix Tapes to unlock multiple layers.

addons.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
addons.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
Increases Object Infection duration by +40 seconds.
Increases Infection gained from infected Objects by +100 %.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.

addons.name: Olibanum Incense
addons.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
The Auras of Survivors cleansing at Pools of Devotion are revealed for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Limestone Seal
addons.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
Increases Object Infection duration by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Healing Salve
addons.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.Applied on skin rashes.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Prophylactic Amulet
addons.description:
A soapstone amulet crudely engraved with a winged deity that wards off sickness.Fills the wearer with devotion.
Decreases available Pools of Devotion by -2.

addons.name: Potent Tincture
addons.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol. Applied directly on blisters.
Reduces Cool-down time of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Haematite Seal
addons.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
Increases Object Infection duration by +30 seconds.

addons.name: Emetic Potion
addons.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +30 %.

addons.name: Blessed Apple
addons.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.Delicious.
Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.

addons.name: Rubbing Oil
addons.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
Increases Charge rate of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +50 %.

addons.name: Infected Emetic
addons.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases effectiveness of Vile Purge by +40 %.

addons.name: Incensed Ointment
addons.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.Applied directly on infected skin.
Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors within The Plague's Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations.

addons.name: Exorcism Amulet
addons.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Ashen Apple
addons.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
Start the Trial with 1 Pool of Devotion already corrupted.
Increases available Pools of Devotion by +1.

addons.name: Worship Tablet
addons.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
Increases Ingestion speed by +100 %.
Increases Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by +4.4 %.

addons.name: Vile Emetic
addons.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.

addons.name: Severed Toe
addons.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.Radiates with vile power.
Increases Infection gained from interacting with Objects by +50 %.

addons.name: Devotee's Amulet
addons.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Seal
addons.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
Each time a Generator is completed, The Plague is automatically granted Corrupt Purge.
Reduces duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.

addons.name: Black Incense
addons.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
The Auras of infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

addons.name: "Philly"
addons.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Reduces the time required to Mark a Survivor by -20 %.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Walleye's Matchbook
addons.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville.A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Reduces the Power Recovery time by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Headline Cut-Outs
addons.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

addons.name: Cheap Cologne
addons.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases the time Survivors stay Marked by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Telephoto Lens
addons.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Cinch Straps
addons.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Night Shroud remains active after missing a Basic Attack.

addons.name: Olsen's Journal
addons.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the Mark expires.

addons.name: Olsen's Address Book
addons.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
Marked Survivors rushing an action reveal their Aura for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Marked Map
addons.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Wallet
addons.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

addons.name: Leather Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.

addons.name: Lasting Perfume
addons.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
Increases the time hooked Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Knife Belt Clip
addons.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Ghost Face by -12 metres while crouching.

addons.name: Chewed Pen
addons.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Increases the time dying Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
addons.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
Whenever a Survivor is Marked by The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.
"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Night Vision Monocular
addons.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds.

addons.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range:ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
Grants a 10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.
"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Driver's License
addons.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity:Danny Johnson.
When Marking a Survivor repairing a Generator, the Generator explodes and loses -20 % of its Progression.
The affected Generator becomes blocked for the next 15 seconds.
Marking multiple Survivors on the same Generator will only apply the penalty once.
"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who is next." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
addons.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
Putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack immediately recharges Night Shroud.
"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

addons.name: Outdoor Security Camera
addons.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
Putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State reveals the Auras of all Survivors for 7 seconds.
"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Rotten Pumpkin
addons.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
The Portals through which The Demogorgon enters the Upside Down are automatically sealed.
Grants 200 bonus Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.

addons.name: Black Heart
addons.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
Reduces the Shred Cool-down after successful Special Attacks by -15 %.

addons.name: Rat Liver
addons.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
Increases the Charging Movement speed of Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

addons.name: Rat Tail
addons.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +35 %.

addons.name: Sticky Lining
addons.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect radius of activated Portals by +2.5 metres.

addons.name: Viscous Webbing
addons.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +16 %.

addons.name: Rotten Green Tripe
addons.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
Increases the Movement speed while teleporting between Portals by +15 %.

addons.name: Mews' Guts
addons.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
Increases the number of available Portals by +1.
Reduces the Shred Cool-down of missed Special Attacks by -11 %.

addons.name: Barb's Glasses
addons.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
Reduces the Shred Cool-down after breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by -15 %.

addons.name: Eleven's Soda
addons.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
While traversing the Upside Down, Generators which are actively being repaired are highlighted in yellow.

addons.name: Thorny Vines
addons.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect radius of activated Portals by +1 metre.
Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +11 %.

addons.name: Brass Case Lighter
addons.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
While closing an activated Portal, Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 60 seconds.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Violet Waxcap
addons.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Deer Lung
addons.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
Increases the Movement speed while teleporting between Portals by +30 %.
Reduces the number of available Portals by -2.

addons.name: Lifeguard Whistle
addons.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
Survivors within the Area of Effect of activated Portals automatically trigger Killer Instinct without The Demogorgon having to charge Of the Abyss.
Reduces the Area of Effect radius by -1 metre.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Vermilion Webcap
addons.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +3 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Upside Down Resin
addons.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
Increases the time it takes Survivors to seal activated Portals by +40 %.
"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Unknown Egg
addons.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
Reduces the Power Recovery time by -1.5 seconds.
"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Leprose Lichen
addons.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
While traversing the Upside Down, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.
"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Red Moss
addons.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
Extends the Undetectable Status Effect after emerging from a Portal by +8 seconds.
Suppresses all noises of The Demogorgon emerging from a Portal.
Increases the time it takes The Demogorgon to emerge from a Portal by +15 %.
"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Rotting Rope
addons.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +2 metres.
"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

addons.name: Paper Lantern
addons.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
Increases the Movement speed of Blood Orbs while attracted to The Oni by +4 m/s.

addons.name: Cracked Sakazuki
addons.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.It never made it through the night before being damaged.
Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blackened Toenail
addons.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.4 m/s.
"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

addons.name: Polished Maedate
addons.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.1 c/s.

addons.name: Ink Lion
addons.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Chipped Saihai
addons.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.

addons.name: Child's Wooden Sword
addons.description:
Akito's practice sword.The child had little use for it after his injury.
Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +3 metres.

addons.name: Bloody Sash
addons.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
Increases' The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.7 m/s.

addons.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
addons.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.

addons.name: Wooden Oni Mask
addons.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +14 %.
Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.
"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

addons.name: Shattered Wakizashi
addons.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.2 c/s.

addons.name: Scalped Topknot
addons.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
Reduces the Activation time of a Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
addons.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.

addons.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
addons.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Splintered Hull
addons.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +33 %.
Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.
"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

addons.name: Lion Fang
addons.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Akito's Crutch
addons.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1.0 m/s.

addons.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
addons.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
Blood Orbs are visible to Survivors.
A Survivor coming into contact with a Blood Orb absorbs it, but has their Aura revealed to you for 2 seconds.
This effect stacks for each absorbed Blood Orb.
"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

addons.name: Iridescent Family Crest
addons.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
Hitting the ground with a missed Demon Strike will cause all Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you.
"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

addons.name: Spit Polish Rag
addons.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Snake Oil
addons.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.Purported to cure all that ails you.
Increases the Reeling speed by +5 %.

addons.name: Rickety Chain
addons.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
Increases the rate at which Survivors break free from The Redeemer by +33 %.

addons.name: Modified Ammo Belt
addons.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Spike
addons.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
Survivors hit with The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Poison Oak Leaves
addons.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
Increases Mending time by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Marshal's Badge
addons.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -4 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Jaw Smasher
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +1 %.
"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Chewing Tobacco
addons.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.Stimulates the nervous system.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Warden's Keys
addons.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Wanted Poster
addons.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly.It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +2.5 %.
"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Tin Oil Can
addons.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Honey Locust Thorn
addons.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
Survivors breaking free from The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
addons.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
Increases the Reeling speed by +9 %.
"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Prison Chain
addons.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
Increases the time required for Survivors to break free from The Redeemer by +10 %.
"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

addons.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
addons.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -8 metres while Aiming Down Sights.
"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

addons.name: Bayshore's Cigar
addons.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.
"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Barbed Wire
addons.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
Increases Mending time by +3.5 seconds.
"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Iridescent Coin
addons.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
Survivors speared by The Redeemer from at least 12 metres away suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they remain speared.
"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

addons.name: Hellshire Iron
addons.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
This effect lingers for an additional 10 seconds.
"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

addons.name: Lead Ring
addons.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Dead Butterfly
addons.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Copper Ring
addons.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +1 second.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

addons.name: Black Strap
addons.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +0.5 metres.

addons.name: Wax Doll
addons.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1 metre.

addons.name: Spearhead
addons.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
addons.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +0.5 seconds.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

addons.name: Forgotten Videotape
addons.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Cinderella Music Box
addons.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +15 seconds.

addons.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
addons.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
addons.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
addons.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1 second.
"It's him..."

addons.name: Mannequin Foot
addons.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Burning Man Painting
addons.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Scarlet Egg
addons.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +3 seconds.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

addons.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
addons.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.
"James... you made me happy." — Mary

addons.name: Lost Memories Book
addons.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

addons.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
addons.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
Injured Survivors affected by Torment suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.
"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

addons.name: Obsidian Goblet
addons.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
The Executioner gains the Undetectable Status Effect when standing on a Rites of Judgement trail.
"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

addons.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
addons.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the Auras of all other Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.
"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

addons.name: Placebo Tablet
addons.description:
A pill that's utterly ineffective... or is it?
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Decreases Rush Movement speed by -15 %.

addons.name: Foxglove
addons.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Compound Seven
addons.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres after a Slam.

addons.name: Chipped Monocle
addons.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
Displays the target location of a Slam.

addons.name: Shredded Notes
addons.description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
Reduces Token Regeneration time by -0.33 seconds per Token.
Decreases available Rush Tokens by 1.

addons.name: Pustula Dust
addons.description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
Increases Slam duration by +0.75 seconds.

addons.name: Plague Bile
addons.description:
A sample of The Plague's bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Canker Thorn
addons.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blighted Rat
addons.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +4 % for each consecutive Rush.

addons.name: Umbra Salts
addons.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
Increases Rush Turn rate by +15 %.

addons.name: Rose Tonic
addons.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
Increases Slam duration by +1 second.

addons.name: Compound Twenty-One
addons.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
When initiating a Slam, reveal the Aura of Survivors within 8 metres of the collision location for 3.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blighted Crow
addons.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
Increases Rush Movement speed by +6 % for each consecutive Rush.

addons.name: Adrenaline Vial
addons.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
Reduces the Token Regeneration time by -1 second per Token.
Increases the maximum Look angle during a Rush by +50 %.
Increases the available Rush Tokens by +2 Tokens.
Increases the Rush Movement speed by +10 %.
Decreases the Rush Turn rate by -0.5 °/s.
"Please, don't do this..."

addons.name: Vigo's Journal
addons.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect while Rushing.
"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Summoning Stone
addons.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will call upon The Entity to block Pallets within a radius of 16 metres of your location for 15 seconds.
"Death is only the beginning."

addons.name: Soul Chemical
addons.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
During a Rush, the moment The Blight comes within 16 metres of a Survivor who is repairing or healing, trigger a tremendously difficult Skill Check for that Survivor.
Soul Chemical can activate once per Survivor per Rush.
Soul Chemical does not trigger for a Rush started within 16 metres of the Survivor.
"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." — Unlabelled Mystery School Text

addons.name: Alchemist's Ring
addons.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It's a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will instantly recharge all Rush Tokens.
"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." — Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

addons.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
addons.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
Upon using all Rush Tokens, your last Lethal Rush will put Survivors into the Dying State.
"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Compound Thirty-Three
addons.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
Any Survivor within 16 metres of a Slam will suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds, reducing their Movement speed by -3 %.
Slamming into Pallets and Breakable Walls immediately destroys them, incurring a Cool-down of 1.5 seconds.
"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Toy Sword
addons.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Tiny Fingernail
addons.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Soured Milk
addons.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.

addons.name: Cat Figurine
addons.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
Displays the Target location of Victor's Pounce.

addons.name: Madeleine's Glove
addons.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.

addons.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
addons.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.A symbol of his tenacity.
Increases the Crushing time of Victor while he is idle by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Cat's Eye
addons.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
Fully charging and holding a Pounce allows Victor to roam silently.

addons.name: Bloody Black Hood
addons.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.Soon, he became the prey.
Reduces the Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Baby Teeth
addons.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.They are unusually sharp.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Weighty Rattle
addons.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Stale Biscuit
addons.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.It was not much, but it was better than most meals
Reduces the Cool-down time of Victor Pounce by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Sewer Sludge
addons.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
Increases the Removing time of Victor by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Needle
addons.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Madeleine's Scarf
addons.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.The Twins kept it as a memento.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.3 m/s.
"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Victor's Soldier
addons.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, their Aura is revealed to Charlotte for 6 seconds.
"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

addons.name: Spinning Top
addons.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
Pouncing on Survivors causes them to drop any Item they may be carrying.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

addons.name: Forest Stew
addons.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
Increases the Movement speed of Victor by +0.6 m/s.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Drop of Perfume
addons.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
While controlling Charlotte, Survivors who are within Victor's Shriek radius suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons (1602)

addons.name: Silencing Cloth
addons.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.
"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

addons.name: Iridescent Pendant
addons.description:
