A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
If a Survivor crushes Victor while he is idle, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.
"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Trick Pouch
addons.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
Start with 4 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 4.

addons.name: Memento Blades
addons.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
Increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity by +1 Charge.

addons.name: Killing Part Chords
addons.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
Slightly increases (+0.04 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +1 %.

addons.name: Inferno Wires
addons.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
Increases Main Event duration by +25 %.

addons.name: Tequila Moonrock
addons.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
Increases Main Event duration by +50 %.

addons.name: On Target Single
addons.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Lucky Blade
addons.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.3 seconds for each Blade Hit.

addons.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
addons.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +1 Stack.

addons.name: Caged Heart Shoes
addons.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
Moderately increases (+0.1 m/s (this value is applied to the start/end parameters of a speed curve)) Throw State Movement speed by +2.5 %.

addons.name: Melodious Murder
addons.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

addons.name: Waiting For You Watch
addons.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
Increases Main Event duration by +0.4 seconds for each Blade Hit.
"Don't run awayDon't say we're throughNo way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN's "Waiting For You"

addons.name: Ripper Brace
addons.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by 3 seconds.

addons.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
addons.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.High sugar and caffeine content.
Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +2 Stacks.

addons.name: Bloody Boa
addons.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.A number of pockets are concealed within it.
Start with 8 extra Blades.
Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 8.

addons.name: Trick Blades
addons.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.

addons.name: Edge of Revival Album
addons.description:
The Trickster's debut album.The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.
"Your whisper on meWarm as can beBurning each breathTill I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

addons.name: Diamond Cufflinks
addons.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.
"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Cut Thru U Single
addons.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
Blades pierce through Survivors.
Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50 % Laceration.
"Can't stop this loveThat's tearing your heartWherever you goI will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

addons.name: Iridescent Photocard
addons.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is two or one Blade Hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect.
"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Death Throes Compilation
addons.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.Terrifying and emotionally raw.
Exiting Main Event replenishes The Trickster's Blades.
"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

addons.name: Visitor Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.It also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +2 metres.
Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +10 °.

addons.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
addons.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
After Zombies hit a Survivor, their Aura turns yellow for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Damaged Syringe
addons.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
Increases Vaccine Injection time for Survivors by +3 seconds.
Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Brian's Intestine
addons.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.It is an appetising sight for zombies.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.25 m/s.

addons.name: Zombie Heart
addons.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
Increases the Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Contamination Points.
"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Mikhail's Eye
addons.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.35 m/s.

addons.name: Marvin's Blood
addons.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
Increases Mutation Rate when hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Mutation Points.
"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you’re not careful." — Marvin Branagh

addons.name: Adrenaline Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Admin Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +4 metres.
Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +17.5 °.

addons.name: Tyrant Gore
addons.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.There are signs of severe burns.
Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Contamination Points.
Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -7.5 seconds.

addons.name: T-Virus Sample
addons.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +1 Contamination Point.

addons.name: Serotonin Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, when a Zombie is destroyed.

addons.name: Plant 43 Vines
addons.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
Increases Supply Case Opening time for Survivors by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Licker Tongue
addons.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
Increases Hindered Status Effect duration after becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.
It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield

addons.name: NE-a Parasite
addons.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
When becoming Contaminated, Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.

addons.name: Jill's Sandwich
addons.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
After a Survivor unlocks a Supply Case, their Aura is revealed to The Nemesis for 12 seconds.

addons.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
addons.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.5 m/s.
Once all 5 Generators are completed, any destroyed Zombies respawn in an Exit Gate area.
"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine

addons.name: Broken Recovery Coin
addons.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.It is broken in half.
Removes 1 Supply Case from the Trial.
"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
addons.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
Increases Zombie Movement speed by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds whenever a Generator is completed.
"S.T.A.R.S..." — Nemesis'

addons.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
addons.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
After using a Vaccine, Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.
"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Dr Matt Gorkis'

addons.name: Leather Strip
addons.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.15 seconds.

addons.name: Lively Crickets
addons.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
Increases Possessed Chain Turn rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Burning Candle
addons.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Bent Nail
addons.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Event in the Deviousness Category.
Hits with Possessed Chains only spawn 1 additional Chain.

addons.name: Wriggling Maggots
addons.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
Increases Possessed Chains Turn rate by +15 %.

addons.name: Spoiled Meal
addons.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +2 metres.

addons.name: Skewered Rat
addons.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.45 seconds.

addons.name: Liquified Gore
addons.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +1 second.

addons.name: Flickering Television
addons.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +4 metres.

addons.name: Torture Pillar
addons.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -6 seconds.
"This isn't for your eyes." — Pinhead

addons.name: Slice of Frank
addons.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.
"The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." — Frank Cotton

addons.name: Larry's Remains
addons.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +2 seconds.
"We want the man who did this." — Pinhead

addons.name: Larry's Blood
addons.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +4 metres.

addons.name: Frank's Heart
addons.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +8 metres.
"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead

addons.name: Original Pain
addons.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.Such pleasure and pain.
Survivors who break free of Possessed Chains suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.
"No tears, please. It's a waste of good suffering." — Pinhead

addons.name: Impaling Wire
addons.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
Summons 1 additional Chain if a Survivor uses the environment to break a Chain.

addons.name: Greasy Black Lens
addons.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
Reveals Survivors hit by Possessed Chains for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Chatterer's Tooth
addons.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
Reveals the Lament Configuration to The Cenobite.Picking up the Lament Configuration has the following effects:
Deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt.
Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
addons.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
While a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 metres of the Lament Configuration cannot see its Aura.
"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead

addons.name: Engineer's Fang
addons.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
Possessed Chains injure Healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional Chains.
Increases Gateway Closing time after hitting a healthy Survivor with a Possessed Chain by +0.25 seconds.
When hitting an injured Survivor with a Possessed Chain, only 1 additional Chain will spawn.
"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead

addons.name: Vibrant Obituary
addons.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
Increases the Killer Instinct duration of Dire Crows by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Thick Tar
addons.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
Increases the time required by Survivors to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Oil Paints
addons.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
Increases the Killer Instinct Detection radius of Dire Crows by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Choclo Corn
addons.description:
A type of corn common in South America.A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Velvet Fabric
addons.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
When a Survivor attempts to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm, the Swarm's Aura remains visible for another 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Untitled Agony
addons.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Still Life Crow
addons.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Festering Carrion
addons.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow takes flight by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Automatic Drawing
addons.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.Do not think — act.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity by -1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Thorny Nest
addons.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
Survivors damaged by Dire Crows suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.

addons.name: Silver Bell
addons.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: O Grief, O Lover
addons.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Darkest Ink
addons.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from the Survivor.

addons.name: Charcoal Stick
addons.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
The Auras of flying Dire Crows are no longer visible.
The Auras of Dire Crows are visible for 0.5 seconds upon being summoned.

addons.name: Severed Tongue
addons.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
Reduces the Slow-down duration of The Artist when Dire Crows take flight by -0.5 seconds.
"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man

addons.name: Severed Hands
addons.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
Any Survivor within 3 metres of a Survivor, who is being swarmed by Dire Crows, will also be swarmed.
"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man

addons.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
addons.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of an idle Dire Crow are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Ink Egg
addons.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
Increases the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by +1 Dire Crow.
Reduces the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by -2 seconds.
"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Iridescent Feather
addons.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect whenever Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and The Artist holds no Dire Crows.
Reduces the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by -1 Dire Crow.
"They saved me when I could not save myself." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Garden of Rot
addons.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
When a Survivor completes the Repel action, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds.
"I see no salvation in the rot." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Videotape Copy
addons.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.It dampens the desire for vengeance.
Projection does not inflict Condemned on nearby Survivors.
Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear Score Events.

addons.name: Old Newspaper
addons.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
Increases the invisibility duration after Manifesting by +33 %.

addons.name: Mother's Mirror
addons.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
Increases the duration of the intermittent visibility phase after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Cabin Sign
addons.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.Carries the memory of those first curses.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -12 seconds.

addons.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
addons.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.A reminder that death comes to us all.
Reduces the time it takes Survivors to acquire another stack of Condemned by -12 % when holding a VHS Tape.

addons.name: Well Stone
addons.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after having been turned off by a Survivor by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
addons.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

addons.name: Reiko's Watch
addons.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by +50 %.

addons.name: Clump of Hair
addons.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
Reduces the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by -6 metres.

addons.name: Well Water
addons.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

addons.name: Ring Drawing
addons.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
Condemned Survivors spread their Condemnation to other Survivors, who complete a Healing action on them.

addons.name: Rickety Pinwheel
addons.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

addons.name: Mother's Comb
addons.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
Reveals the Aura of any TV being turned off in yellow.

addons.name: Bloody Fingernails
addons.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
Increases the duration of the Post-Projection Movement Speed boost by +50 %.

addons.name: VCR
addons.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape.It is still warm to the touch.
All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

addons.name: Telephone
addons.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
Manifesting within 7 metres of a Survivor afflicts them with the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.
"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi

addons.name: Tape Editing Deck
addons.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
Each Survivor starts the Trial with a VHS Tape in their possession, and their highlighted TV is the one farthest from their location.
"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sadako's tape

addons.name: Distorted Photo
addons.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
Survivors witnessing The Onryō Manifest within 16 metres of them scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds.
"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadako Yamamura

addons.name: Remote Control
addons.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
After using Projection, the Auras of Survivors, who are within 16 metres of a TV and carrying a VHS Tape, are revealed to you for 7 seconds.
"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Iridescent Videotape
addons.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
Hitting a Survivor within 8 seconds after Manifesting turns on the last 4 TVs turned off by Projection.
"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Wooden Plank
addons.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking a Survivor by +25 %.

addons.name: Mortar and Pestle
addons.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
The Dredge emerges from the Remnant facing the same direction as a Teleport is activated instead of facing the direction the Remnant was placed in.

addons.name: Follower's Cowl
addons.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
Teleporting back to the Remnant will activate Killer Instinct during Daytime as well.

addons.name: Caffeine Tablets
addons.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
The Auras of locked Lockers are visible to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

addons.name: Malthinker's Skull
addons.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for when Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

addons.name: Haddie's Calendar
addons.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
Reduces the time to exit a locked Locker by -1 second.

addons.name: Fallen Shingle
addons.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

addons.name: Burnt Letters
addons.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring a Survivor by +25 %.

addons.name: Air Freshener
addons.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
Start the Trial with 4 Power Tokens.

addons.name: Worry Stone
addons.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
Reveals the Aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a Locker.

addons.name: War Helmet
addons.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Ottomarian Writing
addons.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.

addons.name: Destroyed Pillow
addons.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Broken Doll
addons.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.None of them were spared.
Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.

addons.name: Tilling Blade
addons.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
Healthy Survivors injured during Nightfall suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and the Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Lavalier Microphone
addons.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
Consuming the last Power Token will reveal the Auras of all Survivors for 3 seconds.
Entering a Locker through teleportation causes all Lockers within 6 metres of any Survivor to open and slam their doors.

addons.name: Field Recorder
addons.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
Nightfall is active at the start of the Trial.
Nightfall activates automatically when the final Generator is completed.
Any Survivor coming into contact with the Remnant suffers from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Boat Key
addons.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
Increases the Teleportation speed by +25 % during Daytime.
When all Generators are completed, all active Locks are instantly broken.

addons.name: Sacrificial Knife
addons.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
Exiting a Locker during Nightfall blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of it for 5 seconds.
"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
addons.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the final 12 seconds of Nightfall.
"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Jewel Beetle
addons.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.
Reduces the remaining Bound duration when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by -50 %.

addons.name: Unicorn Medallion
addons.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.It was placed in storage for years.
Extends the duration of the First Bound by +20 %.
Reduces the duration of the Second Bound by -20 %.

addons.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie
addons.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
Reduces the duration of the First Bound by -20 %.
Extends the duration of the Second Bound by +20 %.

addons.name: Uroboros Tendril
addons.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
Increases the Movement speed of The Mastermind while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.

addons.name: Loose Crank
addons.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
Increases the Movement speed of The Mastermind during the Chain Bound Window by +8 %.

addons.name: Leather Gloves
addons.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.They impart an air of icy professionalism.
Reduces the Power Recharge time by -10 %.

addons.name: Lion Medallion
addons.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
Increases the Throw distance of grabbed Survivors by +30 %.

addons.name: Chalice (Gold)
addons.description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
Increases the remaining Bound duration when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by +50 %.

addons.name: Bullhorn
addons.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
Survivors using the First Aid Spray suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Portable Safe
addons.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
Survivors injured by Virulent Bound suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

addons.name: Red Herb
addons.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
Increases the Interaction time of the First Aid Spray by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Maiden Medallion
addons.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.Its purpose was unknown for many years.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, they suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Video Conference Device
addons.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
Reduces the time for Survivors passively becoming Infected by -30 %.

addons.name: Egg (Gold)
addons.description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
Increases the duration of the additional Virulent Bound Window by +50 %.

addons.name: Dark Sunglasses
addons.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Green Herb
addons.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
Increases the Infection Gain when grabbing a Survivor mid-Bound by 30 %.

addons.name: Helicopter Stick
addons.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot’s when Wesker is involved.
When a Survivor uses a First Aid Spray, reveal their Aura for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Uroboros Virus
addons.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
When a Survivor becomes Critically Infected, reveal their Aura for 4 seconds.
"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving

addons.name: Lab Photo
addons.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
Destroy Pallets and Breakable Walls when colliding while using Virulent Bound.
Removes the ability to vault Pallets while using Virulent Bound.
"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker

addons.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial
addons.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.Decades of research have led to this.
Survivors start the Trial Infected with Uroboros.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when becoming Critically Infected.
"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker

addons.name: Tattered Tabard
addons.description:
Cloaked in heavy fabrics, neither human nor nature could stop them once they had their target.
Increases the Patrol duration of Guards by +6 seconds.

addons.name: Pillaged Mead
addons.description:
Drinks taken from their victims tasted sweet, but such frivolities were often short-lived.
Reduces the Break or Damage Action duration of Guards by -25 %.

addons.name: Map of the Realm
addons.description:
These unique leather maps were not easy to come by, but when they could not be purchased, they could be taken by force.
Increases the Vision range of Guards on Patrol by +4 metres.

addons.name: Gritty Lump
addons.description:
A rock-hard, dense loaf filled their stomachs on most days, giving them the energy to commit truly heinous acts.
Increases the Movement speed of Guards on Patrol by +9 %.

addons.name: Treated Blade
addons.description:
Durkos Malecek, The Assassin, stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.
The Assassin  appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.

addons.name: Dried Horsemeat
addons.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.
Increases the Hunt duration of Guards by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Cold Steel Manacles
addons.description:
Alejandro Santiago, The Jailer, apprenticed as an armourer, and showed no remorse.
The Jailer  appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.

addons.name: Call To Arms
addons.description:
Posted across many towns, lords desperate to protect their riches posted for able-bodied mercenaries.None survived.
Increases the maximum Patrol Path length by +10 metres.
Increases the Movement speed of The Knight while drawing the Patrol Path by +25 %.

addons.name: Battle Axe Head
addons.description:
Sander Rault was a tower of a man, terrifying in form and demeanour.
The Carnifex  appears twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.

addons.name: Town Watch's Torch
addons.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.
If Guards fail to damage Survivors during a Hunt a total of three times, The Knight is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Ironworker's Tongs
addons.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.
If a Guard fails to damage a Survivor during a Hunt, the Survivor will suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for the next 20 seconds.

addons.name: Grim Iron Mask
addons.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia.Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.
When a Guard detects a Survivor during a Patrol, the Survivor will suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for the next 60 seconds.

addons.name: Chain Mail Fragment
addons.description:
Downtime was spent repairing their armour, to avoid being on the receiving end of a fatal blow.
Guards inflict the Haemorrhage Status Effect when damaging a Survivor.

addons.name: Broken Hilt
addons.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.
Guards inflict the Mangled Status Effect when damaging a Survivor.

addons.name: Lightweight Greaves
addons.description:
Sometimes he wore lighter armour, letting him move faster; he knew nothing could stop him anyway.
After summoning The Jailer , Lightweight Greaves increases the Movement speed of The Knight by +10 % for the next 6 seconds.

addons.name: Healing Poultice
addons.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.
After summoning The Assassin , all Survivors within 24 metres of The Assassin's spawn location scream and reveal their location for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Flint and Steel
addons.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon.Fear was often their greatest ally.
After summoning The Carnifex , the Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of any unbroken dropped Pallets are revealed to The Knight for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Blacksmith's Hammer
addons.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.
If a Survivor escapes a Guard Hunt by any means other than grabbing the Standard, they will suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect and the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Knight's Contract
addons.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio's employ.The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.
Every fourth Guard summoned causes Survivors within 12 metres of that Guard to suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 8 seconds.
"I fear he has left me here to die." — Vittorio Toscano

addons.name: Iridescent Company Banner
addons.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves 'civilised' ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.
Drawing a Patrol Path through Windows blocks them for all Survivors for 15 seconds after summoning a Guard.
The Exit Gates are blocked by Entity Spikes for the Hunted Survivor.
All Windows vaulted by the Hunted Survivor are blocked for all Survivors for the remainder of the Hunt.
"They huddle in their villages like parasites! They have lost the drive for power." — Tarhos Kovács

addons.name: Ultrasonic Trap Speaker
addons.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
Reduces the time for The Skull Merchant to gain the Undetectable Status Effect by -50 %.

addons.name: High-Power Floodlight
addons.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
Survivors inside the Area of Effect of a Drone suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: High-Current Upgrade
addons.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
Reduces the Cool-down time of manually activating Drones by -10 %.

addons.name: Adi Valente Issue 1
addons.description:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
Reduces the size of Skill Checks for Survivors inside the Area of Effect of a Drone by -20 %.
This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Stereo Remote Mic
addons.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
Increases the duration of the Unhackable state of a Drone by +10 %.

addons.name: Shotgun Speakers
addons.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the Drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
Suppresses the Warning sound of Skill Checks for Survivors inside the Area of Effect of a Drone.
This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Supercharge
addons.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
Extends the battery life of the Claw Trap by +12 %.

addons.name: Low-Power Mode
addons.description:
By intermittently powering on and off non-vital components, the Drone can stay on for longer.
Increases the duration of the Drone's Active Mode by +10 %.

addons.name: Adaptive Lighting
addons.description:
The Drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
Increases the Lingering duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +50 %.

addons.name: Vital Targeting Processor
addons.description:
An additional process in the Drone's programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
Increases the Progression speed of Lock On by +10 %.

addons.name: Powdered Glass
addons.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
Hitting a Survivor with a Claw Trap attached to them suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.

addons.name: Loose Screw
addons.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the Drone, and it seems like it may fall at any moment, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
Survivors inside the Area of Effect of a Drone suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Infrared Upgrade
addons.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
After removing their Claw Trap, that Survivor's Aura is revealed to you for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Brown Noise Generator
addons.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the Drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
Survivors inside the Area of Effect of a Drone suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Randomised Strobes
addons.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
Survivors entering the Area of Effect of a Drone suffer from a -5 % Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Geographical Readout
addons.description:
The Drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
While inside the Area of Effect of a Drone, The Skull Merchant benefits from the following effects:

Grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect.
Increases the Action speed of breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets, or damaging Generators by +15 %.
Both effects linger for 15 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Prototype Rotor
addons.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the Drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
While inside the Area of Effect of a Drone activated by a Survivor's presence, The Skull Merchant benefits from the following effect:

Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect.
This effect does not stack and can only be triggered once per active Drone.
This effect is lost upon hitting a Survivor.

addons.name: Advanced Movement Prediction
addons.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influenced, a refined AI programme predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
Survivors entering the Area of Effect of a Drone have their Aura revealed for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Expired Batteries
addons.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries.Recharging is not recommended.
All Survivors start the Trial with a Claw Trap attached to them.
These Claw Traps only have 40 % of their Battery remaining.

addons.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript
addons.description:
Before he disappeared, Adriana's father had started a newer, darker manga: Sonhadores Sombrios.
Manually activating a Drone causes it to emit a Terror Radius of 32 metres for the next 15 seconds.
This effect can only be applied to one Drone at a time.
Increases the Cool-down time of manually activating Drones by +25 %.
"When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!" — Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1

addons.name: Nutritional Slurry
addons.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.
Start with 2 additional Biopods.

addons.name: Kid's Ball Glove
addons.description:
A kid's baseball glove owned by one of the colonists.His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.
Extends the duration of Overclock Mode by +25 %.

addons.name: Heavy Water
addons.description:
A by-product of the micro-fission reactors powering cryo and life support.Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.
Reduces the Aura-reveal range of Supply Cases by -8 metres.

addons.name: Broken Security Key
addons.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship's equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.
Reduces the Reboot timer of disabled Biopods by -15 %.

addons.name: Ultrasonic Sensor
addons.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum.Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.
Grants the ability to hear sounds through the controlled Biopod after 0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)
addons.description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects.Intended to help with repair.
Successful hits during Overclock Mode inflict the Mangled Status Effect until the Survivor is fully healed.

addons.name: Cryo Gel
addons.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.
Increases the Spreading rate of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Cremated Remains
addons.description:
After extracting the other colonists' DNA, he burned their remains.
Survivors within 12 metres of a Biopod suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Android Arm
addons.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made its extermination of humans easier, it also gave it more parts to work with.
Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.

addons.name: Spent Oxygen Tank
addons.description:
Without air to breathe, organics do not last long.
Survivors becoming afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Live Wires
addons.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.
Survivors scream after removing Temporal Slipstream, interrupting their current interaction.

addons.name: Hyperawareness Spray
addons.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus.Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.
Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream hear the Terror Radius as if The Singularity were nearby.

addons.name: Hologram Generator
addons.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.
After a successful Slipstream Teleport from a Biopod, the targeted Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Foreign Plant Fibres
addons.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.
Reduces the duration of the Movement Speed penalty after being hit with a Pallet during Overclock Mode by +20 %.

addons.name: Nanomachine Gel
addons.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly.However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.
Successful hits during Overclock Mode inflict the Broken Status Effect for 40 seconds.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)
addons.description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.
The Auras of Survivors picking up an EMP are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Denied Requisition Form
addons.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.
All Survivors start the Trial afflicted by Temporal Slipstream.
Supply Cases take 30 additional seconds to print an EMP at the start of the Trial.

addons.name: Crew Manifest
addons.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.
The Auras of Survivors becoming afflicted by Temporal Slipstream from a Biopod or another Survivor are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.

addons.name: Soma Family Photo
addons.description:
A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.
Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect during Overclock Mode.
Reduces the duration of Overclock Mode by -50 %.
"YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS." — HUX-A7-13

addons.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard
addons.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave it sentience.
Creating a Biopod triggers Killer Instinct for 6 seconds on all Survivors within 6 metres of that Biopod.
"HELLO WORLD." — HUX-A7-13
